meta.title: Ecosystem | Pledge & Grow
meta.description: Discover the advantages of being part of the Pledge & Grow ecosystem, including access to our group companies, innovation projects, and exclusive partners with significant discounts.

hero.title: Our Ecosystem
hero.subtitle: Collaborative Growth
hero.description: Join a thriving network of innovators, partners, and clients working together to create exceptional digital experiences and drive business growth.

advantages.title: Benefits of Our Ecosystem
advantages.subtitle: Why Join Our Network
advantages.description: As a client of Pledge & Grow, you gain access to a wealth of advantages that help your business grow and thrive.

exclusiveDiscounts.title: Exclusive Discounts
exclusiveDiscounts.description: Receive significant reductions on services from our partner companies, helping you save on essential business needs.

priorityAccess.title: Priority Access
priorityAccess.description: Get priority access to new features, services, and innovation projects before they're available to the general public.

groupResources.title: Group Resources
groupResources.description: Leverage the combined expertise and resources of all Pledge & Grow group companies for your projects.

strategicPartnerships.title: Strategic Partnerships
strategicPartnerships.description: Connect with our network of trusted partners to expand your business opportunities and reach.

enhancedSupport.title: Enhanced Support
enhancedSupport.description: Benefit from dedicated support and extended service hours exclusively available to ecosystem members.

earlyInnovation.title: Early Innovation Access
earlyInnovation.description: Be among the first to test and implement cutting-edge solutions from our internal innovation projects.

partners.title: Our Partner Network
partners.subtitle: Exclusive Partnerships
partners.description: We've built strategic partnerships with industry leaders to enhance our service offerings and provide comprehensive solutions.
partners.clientBenefit: As a Pledge & Grow client, you gain exclusive access to our network of trusted partners, each offering special discounts and benefits, including a minimum 5% reduction on all partner services.

taskmate.name: TaskMate
taskmate.description: AI-powered process automation and agent development platform for business efficiency.
benefits: Access to premium AI automation features
useCases: Build custom agents for specific business needs

sharka.description: UGC creation platform that helps businesses generate authentic user content at scale.
useCases: Generate authentic user testimonials and reviews
Create social media content at scale
Build a library of user-generated product demonstrations

cordunite.description: Professional Discord community creation and management agency.
